descriptionHtml:
This is my first real mod so any CONSTRUCTIVE criticism would be appreciated.


Description:
Allestar is a Khajiit rogue from Elsweyr. He was turned into a vampire due to a complicated love triangle forcing him to leave his home.
He has spent his exile searching for fortune and ways to strengthen his vampiric abilities. For a time he even studied under the grey beards.
He has come to rest at The Bee and Barb in Riften while waiting for another odd job to crop up.


I have given Allestar the dragon rend shout and the marked for death shout. He levels with the player and I tried to make it so he can stand on his own instead of making the player do all the work.

Update:
The new file has Allestar\'s facegen in it too so he should look like I originally intended now.

Update:
I have now uploaded a Dawnguard version. Allestar is now a full blooded vampire and has gained a plethora of spells and perks associated with the DLC.

Update:
I have just uploaded a Dragonborn version. Allestar now has stalhrim weapons and a few new spells. Please note that these files are supposed to be used separately not all at the same time.

Update:
I have just uploaded a version of Allestar with perks, powers, and weapons from both Dragonborn and Dawnguard.
author: BellBoy
